con:testCase.name: BadCase-DEV-BankTransfer-IBANsUnknown
con:testCase.con:description:
https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-3073
Followed test-scenario is implemented in test-case:
Create camt054-credit file with IBAN unknown in header from camt054 file for DRC, as in example below, but valid IBAN in file name. Create camt054-credit file with IBAN unknown in header from camt054 file for DRC, as in example below, and wrong IBAN in file name. Copy files to mft and exec all jobs for processing camt054 files on BT. Validate results.
Expected: Camt-files are not processed and renamed to failed.
